Package net.alexanderdev.lightdrive.util.io

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationIO
    A class for loading animated GIFs from a source folder.
    FontIO
    A class for registering new Fonts from a source folder with the local GraphicsEnvironment.
    PropertiesIO
    A class for reading and writing preference/property files from a source folder.
    ResourceLoader
    A class which provides a visualization of base resource loading progress as a splash screen.
    Screenshot
    A class used to save screenshots of any Viewable.
    SoundIO
    A class for reading audio files from source folder.
    SpriteIO
    A class for loading images from a source folder.
    TextIO
    A class for reading and writing plain text files line by line from a source folder.
    XMLIO
    A class for reading and writing XML files from a source folder.
